title: New: Woman's Hour – Her Ghost
body:
I’ve got a sneaking feeling that when **Woman’s Hour** get round to releasing an album, it’ll be one of the best of recent times.

The London quartet show exactly why on new track _Her Ghost_, a startlingly majestic number that’s undoubtedly their most direct track to date. With a host of dates coming up with Anna Calvi, alongside a trip across the pond to take in SXSW, LA and New York, 2014 is shaping up rather nicely for Woman’s Hour.

February 11th – All Saints Church, Brighton w/Anna Calvi  
February 12th – Komedia, Bath w/Anna Calvi  
February 14th – Le Trianon, Paris w/Anna Calvi  
February 15th – Le Trianon, Paris w/Anna Calvi  
March 11th – 16th South By South West Festival, Austin, Texas  
March 17th Bardot, Los Angeles  
March 19th Mercury Lounge, New York  
March 21st Glasslands, New York  
April 3rd The Purcell Rooms, London  
April 25th Gulliver’s, Manchester  
April 26th Cathedral, Sheffield  
April 27th Bodega Social Club, Nottingham  
May 7th Louisiana, Bristol  
May 8th The Great Escape Festival, Brighton
